title: We're voting for Karen Bass for L.A. mayor. Here's why
dc:creator: Jonah Valdez, Nathan Solis
description: Voters from neighborhoods across L.A. weigh in on why they're voting for Rep. Karen Bass in the mayor's race.
content:encoded: Voters from neighborhoods across L.A. weigh in on why they're voting for Rep. Karen Bass in the mayor's race.

media:content.media:description: LOS ANGELES, CA - MAY 27: Rep. Karen Bass, a candidate for Los Angeles mayor, gathers with various prominent supporters at Angel's Point in Elysian Park to celebrate the campaign's momentum ahead of June's primary election on Friday, May 27, 2022 in Los Angeles, CA. (Jason Armond / Los Angeles Times)
